text: Troyan (Bulgarian: Троян) is a town in Bulgaria. Troyan may also refer to: ==Places== *Troyan Municipality, in Lovech Province, Bulgaria *Troyan (village), in Simeonovgrad municipality, Haskovo Province, Bulgaria *Troyan Peak, in Antarctica *Troyan Pass, a mountain pass in the Balkan Mountains *Troyan Monastery, Bulgaria ==People== *Troyan (surname) *Troyan Radulov (born 1974), a Bulgarian footballer ==See also== * *Troian (disambiguation) *Trojan (disambiguation)
title: Troyan (disambiguation)
